adamantine_bar.description: A bar of pure Adamantine. Unimaginably valuable among dwarves.

geyserite.description: This mineral is known for absorbing volcanic energy. Warning: VERY explosive

lumium_bar.description: A shining bar of Lumium, imbued with essence of Shadowed Vale. Contains powerful magical energy

mithril_bar.description: A bar of pure Mithril. Light yet effective for ranged weapons and wands.

raw_adamantine.description: Unprocessed Adamantine. Durable and strong, used for toughest equipment.

raw_lumium.description: Unprocessed Lumium. Magical essence radiates from it, even though it's completely raw.

raw_titanium.description: Unprocessed Titanium. This tough metal requires processing in the Deepslate Forge.

silver_ingot.description: A shining ingot of Silver. Has underrated magical potential.

titanium_ingot.description: A shimmering ingot of Titanium. This metal is valued by mechanics and dwarves for its toughness.
